entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Salmon Arm
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salmon Arm 08:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -11.7°C
Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
